table.name: vtiger_hrm_kpi
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_hrm_kpi` ( `id` INT(11) NOT NULL, `kpi_name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `kpi_description` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `kpi_status` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `kpi_type` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `kpi_manager` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `kpi_department` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `start_date` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `due_date` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `cf_01` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `cf_02` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `cf_03` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `cf_04` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `kpi_weight` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `kpi_ranking` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `cf_07` varchar(100) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_hrm_kpicf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_hrm_kpicf` ( `id` int(19) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
